user.title: API Credential
user.description:
If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/n3rgy/

Some sensors are not enabled by default. You can enable them in the entity registry after the integration configuration.
Weather forecast is not enabled by default. You can enable it in the integration options.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

user.title: Options
user.description: You can set the property id, start datetime, end datetime.
